I hope this article helps to induce more Japanese usersâœ¨

item.title: Auxy is featured in App Store story ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
JPNYC:

I wish there was a blog that showed the behind the scenes work that goes into the app. Articles on best mobile music creation practices, tips and tricks, interviews with other artists and their process, sneek peeks on updates and new sounds.

There are a few really good mobile music focussed YouTube channels.
The Audiobus forum is a great resource as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy is featured in App Store story ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ

item.title: Auxy is featured in App Store story ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ
item.dc:creator: JPNYC
item.description:
I really wish that Auxy got more â€˜air timeâ€™. I wish there was more recent reviews by top music magazines, musicians, blogs etc. I feel that Auxy the brand is really missing out on a greater audience, because of the lack of social media engagement and greater community interaction.

The users do a great job here in this community with supporting each other and sharing etc, but I wish the outside world at large could see what Auxy is capable of.

I wish there was a blog that showed the behind the scenes work that goes into the app. Articles on best mobile music creation practices, tips and tricks, interviews with other artists and their process, sneek peeks on updates and new sounds.

A short documentary on an artist who creates music scores while riding the subway in NYC every day. Stories about how Auxy is being integrated into an artists bigger workflow. Featured artist of the month. Limited addition merch. Stickers â€˜made with Auxyâ€™.

If you need help with any of this, let me know.

Read full topic
